about_the_game:
made by a young game developer :)

P.S: if you wanna stream it on twitch, record a youtube video, or anything like this, just do it! This is pretty hard hand responding to every email. If you wanna make a video or stream, then do it! You don't need my permission.

Explore the seemingly infinite expanse of eerily familiar levels in the backrooms based on the popular creepypasta lore. Each level features different ways to escape with danger along the way.


Realistic graphics, minimal user interfaces, and dreary ambience will ensure an immersive experience.

Explore the backrooms with a team of up to 4 players. Be warned, as teammates may no-clip into other areas of the map and one member of your team must find the exit alive to escape.


Traverse though 8 unique levels based on backrooms lore with regular content updates adding more. Each level features a different way to escape with various danger along the way.


Check every corner so you won't be caught off guard by one of 4 hostile entities in the backrooms, each with their own mechanics you'll need to quickly learn if you want to survive.


Communicate with your teammates with proximity voice chat. Be sure to not wander far away from your team, as you can easily get lost in the confusing expanse of the backrooms. Entities can also hear you, so stay quiet whenever you're near any danger.

content_descriptors.notes: When players die, blood is shown. Entities eat players.

name: Exit the Backrooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5500 OR Intel Core i3-13100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard i guess
  • VR Support: no VR yet
  • Additional Notes: Some of the info here might be incorrect, as i don't have the money to afford to buy these specs to test it.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard i guess
  • VR Support: no VR yet
  • Additional Notes: These are the specs of my computer, and it runs okay on mine

short_description: Embark on a journey through 8 levels of the Backrooms designed to trigger the liminal feeling in your brain. Be ware, because one of the 4 entities could be stalking you at any moment.
